PLEASE NOTE:

If you're reading this, we assume you're here for our Open Beta weekend in March 2026, this is not yet a full game release.

The things you read and experience are subject to change/improve, and we're super keen to hear your feedback!

Discord is the best place for that, you can find a link to our official server on this here store page.

PLEASE WISHLIST :)

ABOUT MASTERS OF MAYHEM

Welcome to Masters of Mayhem, a fantastical free‑to‑play world packed with adventure, teamwork, and of course, mayhem!

Feature Overview (BETA WEEKEND MARCH 2026)

  • Two maps, each with their own unique monster: Arctic Base and Temple.

  • Four playable characters, with more to unlock.

  • Per-match perks. Pick and choose how each match plays out for you.

  • Tactile tasks. Carry out a variety of tasks that test your observational skills, speed, judgment and more!

  • In-game text chat.

  • In-game voice & proximity chat.

  • Public and Private lobbies.

  • Customizable Gameplay for private lobbies. Your lobby, your rules!

MORE INFO

GAME MODE: MONSTER LOCKDOWN!

Step into our debut game mode, Monster Lockdown, where 4–15 players heroically restore abandoned facilities and contain terrifying creatures… unless someone decides betrayal sounds more fun today. It usually does.

Think: social-deduction-meets action-adventure-meets-monsters. Monsters like "Mother" here, demonstrating her terrifyingly adorable agility.

THIS IS THE START: IT'S AN EVOLVING GAME!

Monster Lockdown is only the beginning! Masters of Mayhem is a universe we are committed to expanding, with more gameplay modes already on the way. We want to tackle different genres, all the while staying true to a multiplayer mayhem ethos!

MORE CHARACTERS TO COME: YOU'LL HAVE MORE THAN ONE FAVORITE!

Our roster is constantly growing; we already have more loveable characters waiting in the wings! Each character is lovingly crafted by our in-house art and animation team. Every detail matters, and each character has lore and secrets!

PLAY WITH AND AGAINST OTHERS: ONLINE PLAY

Play online with friends and strangers, with public and private lobbies available from the get-go! While we recommend using voice chat in Masters of Mayhem, you can communicate via text chat if that's more your thing!

COMMUNITY FIRST: JOIN OUR DISCORD TO HELP US SHAPE MASTERS OF MAYHEM

Your feedback is important to us, and we would love to hear any and all thoughts over on our official Discord server. Hop on in, make some friends, and help us make our game even better!
